ActorTalk: Commandant? I didn't expect to meet you here.
There's still some time before we have to leave for the mission. Did you need something, Commandant?
I've already checked all my equipment and weapons. I just wanted to collect my thoughts here before leaving.
The scenery here always brings me peace. It helps me stay focused before a mission.
I am reflecting on some thingsâ€”faith, duty, and the smiling faces that I need to protect.
Whenever I see moments of peace, it gives meaning to my blade.
Thank you for your concern, Commandant.
All preparations are complete. Please don't worry about it.
Your concern is the greatest support I could ask for.
Understood, Commandant. I should be heading out now. Please take care, and I'll see you soon.
